name: Meta Common Bond 1 Quiz | Common Bond | 10 Questions

questions.text: Computers, the Garden of Eden, pie.
questions.explanation:
Apples&Apple.

	Apple Computers, the apple in the Garden of Eden, and apple pie.

questions.text: A Woody Allen movie, a prop in sight gags, monkeys.
questions.explanation:
Bananas&Banana.

	"Bananas" the movie, a banana peel to slip on, and monkey food.

Grape&grapes.

	Wine is made from grapes, grape jelly, and Concord grapes.

questions.text: A color, an Anthony Burgess novel, a football bowl game.
questions.explanation:
Orange & oranges.

	The color orange, the book "A Clockwork Orange," and the Orange Bowl.

questions.text: A car in mint condition, the top of an ice cream sundae, a flavor of Ben and Jerry's ice cream.
questions.explanation:
Cherry&cherries.

	A car in mint condition is said to be "cherry," a maraschino cherry atop a sundae, and Cherry Garcia ice cream.

questions.text: Shortcake, a Beatles song, a blonde.
questions.explanation:
Strawberry &strawberries.

	Strawberry shortcake, "Strawberry Fields," and strawberry blonde.

questions.text: A defective car, meringue, a drink that kids sell.
questions.explanation:
Lemon&lemons.

	A defective car is a lemon, lemon meringue, and lemonade.

questions.text: A sound made by vibrating the tongue, a Prince song, jam.
questions.explanation:
raspberry&raspberries.

	A raspberry with the tongue, "Raspberry Beret," and raspberry jam.

questions.text: A specific day, to go out with someone, nut bread.
questions.explanation:
Date&dates.

	A specific day is a date, going out with someone is a date, and date nut bread.

questions.text: So what do all of these answers have in common?
questions.explanation:
Fruit&fruits.

	All of the answers are types of fruit.
